name: sofe
description: Sofe is a self-hosted feedback and idea board for web apps. It lets users submit, vote, and comment on feature requests via a simple UI, helping prioritize development.
features: Feature requests: Collects user feedback and feature suggestions.
Voting system: Allows users to upvote ideas to prioritize development.
Comment threads: Discusses feature requests with threaded comments.
Status tracking: Marks requests as planned, in progress, or completed.
Roadmap view: Displays planned features in public roadmap.
User authentication: Requires login to submit and vote on ideas.
Admin moderation: Manages and organizes submitted feedback.
Email notifications: Alerts users when their requests are updated.
Search and filter: Finds specific requests by keyword or status.
Tag organization: Categorizes requests with custom tags.
Public or private: Controls visibility of feedback board.
Integration ready: Connects with project management tools via webhooks.
